name: Hell: Cube
description:
Hey.
So, I've played with some basic level design ideas in this project.

It is based on Brackeys tutorial - hit the link for this amazing playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j48LtUkZRjU&list=PLPV2KyIb3jR53Jce9hP7G5xC4O9AgnOuL

But.. it seemed like a good idea to make it somewhat harder. So.. it's hell now.

Three zones:

  • Standard controls
  • Rolling physics
  • Invisible floor

Reach the end to win this game ;-)
